name: Spectacular Spouse
description:
SPECTACULAR SPOUSE

Get home!

Choose your character!

Husband shoots!

Click, drag and release.

Wife swings!

Click on obstacles to hook and then A or D to move

Developed by Jacky Cheong, Luke Head and Steven Zhang.

Art by Steven Zhang and Luke Head

Sound by Jacky Cheong

Shadow Beamer font by Balprick Studio Link: https://www.dafont.com/balpirick-studio.d8738

Music: www.bensound.com
